CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Elisabeth Steiner;George Nicolaou;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicants’ names and other details are indicated in the appended table . All the applicants were members of the NORP military forces and took part in peace - keeping operations in former GPE and/or in other military missions outside GPE .

CARDINAL . In DATE they sued the military unit no . CARDINAL before ORG for payment of outstanding DATE allowance allegedly due to them on account of their military missions abroad . The court granted the ORG claims ( see dates of the judgments and sums awarded in the appended table ) . The judgments were not appealed against and became binding and enforceable on the dates indicated in the appended table .

CARDINAL . The judgments of DATE were not enforced . On DATE the ORG of ORG decided , upon its President ’s request for supervisory review , to quash these judgments in view of an erroneous application of material law and sent the cases for a new consideration to ORG ( judgments ORG . CARDINAL , DATE and DATE ) . The applicants did not attend the hearing . It does not appear from the case - file that the applicants or their counsel had been informed of the supervisory - review proceedings or that they were able to take part in these proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE ORG reconsidered the cases and dismissed the ORG claims . These judgments were upheld on appeal by ORG on DATE and thus became final .

CARDINAL . The judgments of CARDINAL and DATE in favour of PERSON were enforced on DATE and DATE respectively . On DATE ORG partially granted this applicant ’s claim for compensation of the inflation losses due to the delay in the execution of the judgment of DATE . The court awarded compensation for the inflation losses occurred DATE and DATE , i.e. a sum of CARDINAL CARDINAL RUB instead of CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL RUB claimed by the applicant for the total delay in enforcement .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law as in force in the material time is summed up in the ORG ’s judgment in the case of ORG ( see ORG v. GPE , no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § DATE , ORG CARDINALIX ) .

CARDINAL . In DATE the judgments delivered against the public authorities were executed in accordance with a special procedure established , inter alia , by the ORG ’s Decree No . CARDINAL of DATE and , subsequently , by Decree No . CARDINAL of DATE , entrusting execution to ORG ( see further details in PERSON and Others v. GPE , nos . MONEY , PERSON , CARDINAL and CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL - CARDINAL , DATE ) .
